mapper.sql: pzh, mxdh, spkh, ksmc, cmzbh, ysmc, bxbh, bxmc, ysbh, yslsh, jldw, jj, lsj, dpj, zkl, hbzxx, hjhrq, cm1, cm2, cm3, cm4, cm5, cm6, cm7, cm8, cm9, cm10, cm11, cm12, cm13, cm14, cm15, cm16, cm17, cm18, cm19, cm20, cm21, cm22, cm23, cm24, cm25, cm26, cm27, cm28, cm29, cm30, cm31, cm32, cm33, cm34, cm35
mapper.select:
SELECT sum(cm1+cm2+cm3+cm4+cm5+cm6+cm7+cm8+cm9+cm10+cm11+cm12+cm13+cm14+cm15+cm16+cm17+cm18+cm19+cm20+cm21+cm22+cm23+cm24+cm25+cm26+cm27+cm28+cm29+cm30+cm31+cm32+cm33+cm34+cm35) as total from yw_cg_ddmx
and pzh =#{pzh}

SELECT sum(jj) from yw_cg_ddmx
and pzh =#{pzh}
mapper.insert:
insert into yw_cg_ddmx (pzh, mxdh, spkh, ksmc, cmzbh, ysmc, bxbh, bxmc, ysbh, yslsh, jldw, jj, lsj, dpj, zkl, hbzxx, hjhrq, cm1, cm2, cm3, cm4, cm5, cm6, cm7, cm8, cm9, cm10, cm11, cm12, cm13, cm14, cm15, cm16, cm17, cm18, cm19, cm20, cm21, cm22, cm23, cm24, cm25, cm26, cm27, cm28, cm29, cm30, cm31, cm32, cm33, cm34, cm35) values
(#{bean.pzh},#{bean.mxdh},#{bean.spkh},#{bean.ksmc},#{bean.cmzbh},#{bean.ysmc},#{bean.bxbh},#{bean.bxmc},#{bean.ysbh},#{bean.yslsh}, #{bean.jldw}, #{bean.jj},#{bean.lsj}, #{bean.dpj}, #{bean.zkl}, #{bean.hbzxx}, #{bean.hjhrq}, #{bean.cm1}, #{bean.cm2}, #{bean.cm3}, #{bean.cm4}, #{bean.cm5}, #{bean.cm6}, #{bean.cm7}, #{bean.cm8}, #{bean.cm9}, #{bean.cm10}, #{bean.cm11}, #{bean.cm12}, #{bean.cm13}, #{bean.cm14}, #{bean.cm15}, #{bean.cm16}, #{bean.cm17}, #{bean.cm18}, #{bean.cm19}, #{bean.cm20}, #{bean.cm21}, #{bean.cm22}, #{bean.cm23}, #{bean.cm24}, #{bean.cm25}, #{bean.cm26}, #{bean.cm27}, #{bean.cm28}, #{bean.cm29}, #{bean.cm30}, #{bean.cm31}, #{bean.cm32}, #{bean.cm33}, #{bean.cm34}, #{bean.cm35})
